title: PySpark Data I/O — Reading, Writing & Optimizing Big Data
description: Learn how to efficiently read, write, and process data in PySpark including CSV, JSON, Parquet, ORC, JDBC databases, cloud storage, streaming, and compression. A complete guide for beginners and data engineers.

frontMatter.title: PySpark Data I/O — Reading, Writing & Optimizing Big Data
frontMatter.description: Learn how to efficiently read, write, and process data in PySpark including CSV, JSON, Parquet, ORC, JDBC databases, cloud storage, streaming, and compression. A complete guide for beginners and data engineers.
frontMatter.og:title: PySpark Data I/O — Complete Guide for Reading & Writing Data
frontMatter.og:description: Master PySpark Data I/O — Learn how to read and write CSV, JSON, Parquet, ORC, connect to databases, handle streaming data, optimize performance with partitioning, bucketing, and compression.
